document_data.name: Stallion Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Stallion Street''' was a minor avenue of dirt and gravel in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: Stallion Street ran from east to west, shooting off south-west from [[Trollmarch]], then passing through [[Immar Street]] and [[Pony Way]]. It terminated in a dead-end, in the center of a block of buildings between Pony Way and [[Whaelgond Way]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
* The residence of [[Maerik Thaelcloak]].{{Cite dragon/270/The New Adventures of Volo: The Ardeep|93}}
* The editorial office of the ''[[Waterdeep Wazoo]]''.
